title: Slán To Sláinte: A short story
description: Gaius Gnaeus Guinness is a successful advertising producer that is famous for his satirical commercials, and yet he respects his personal assistant and takes care of his part-time cat. One day the Irish government asks Gaius to create a commercial in order to break a curse that is killing many Galwegians in Ireland and abroad.
author: Chiara Benedetta Condorelli
